articles.author: Charlotte Cripps
articles.title: For all its absurdity, Netflix’s Dead to Me captures the grief, anger and sadness of losing a partner - The Independent
articles.description: The first season ended with a cliffhanger – did Jen kill Steve or not? But what is most poignant about the second season is not who killed him, but how well the show deals with grief, writes Charlotte Cripps
articles.content: In the new season of Netflixs Dead to Me, Linda Cardellinis Judy snuggles up to a large freezer, inside which is the body of her murdered ex-fiancé. It is a strangely tender moment. I cant sleep and I dont think Steve can either, she tells her best friend Jen… [+3191 chars]
